sen.j: 多比理岐志麻流美神（たひりきしまるみのかみ）は、日本神話に登場する神 (神道)である。
sen.e: Tahirikishimarumi no kami was the god (Shinto religion) appeared in Japanese Mythology.
Tahirikishimarumi no kami was a god (Shinto religion) who appeared in Japanese Mythology.
Tahirikishimarumi no kami was a god (Shinto religion) who appeared in Japanese Mythology.

sen.j: 『古事記』の大国主神の系譜に5世の孫神として登場するが、神名のみで事跡も語られていないため、その名義も不明である。
sen.e: He was appeared as the fifth grandchild god on genealogy of Okuninushi no kami in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), but nothing but the god's name was stated, so the name was also unknown.

He was appeared as the fifth grandchild god in the genealogy of Okuninushi no kami in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), but nothing but the god's name was stated, so the name was also unknown.
sen.cmt: Robert: A difference needs to be made between神名 and 名義、otherwise this translation makes no sense
sen.e: He was appeared as the fifth grandchild god in the genealogy of Okuninushi no kami in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), but nothing but the god's name was stated, so the name was also unknown.

sen.j: ちなみに、大国主神の4世の孫神、甕主日子神（みかぬしひこのかみ）が淤加美神の娘比那良志毘売（ひならしびめ）を娶って生んだ子神と記述されている。
sen.e: In fact, it was stated that he was the child god born between the forth grandchild god of Okuninushi no kami, Mikanushihiko no kami and Hinarashibime who was the daughter of Takaokami no Kami by marriage.

In fact, it was stated that he was a child god born between the forth grandchild god of Okuninushi no kami, Mikanushihiko no kami and Hinarashibime who was the daughter of Takaokami no Kami by marriage.
